mapper.insert: INSERT INTO meeting_room_rsv (room_no, emp_no, rsv_date, conference_title, conference_desc, conference_users, time_period) VALUES (#{roomNo}, #{empNo}, #{rsvDate}, #{conferenceTitle}, #{conferenceDesc}, #{conferenceUsers}, #{timePeriod} )
mapper.select: SELECT room_no AS roomNo , emp_no AS empNo , rsv_date AS rsvDate , conference_title AS conferenceTitle , conference_desc AS conferenceDesc , conference_users AS conferenceUsers , time_period AS timePeriod FROM meeting_room_rsv ORDER BY rsvDate DESC LIMIT #{beginRow}, #{rowPerPage}
